overview: Danica Dillon has a secret. She's a lesbian and she plans on telling her parents at the ball she's attending. Meanwhile, Nicki Hunter, Elexis Monroe, Shyla Jennings, Dana Dearmond, Kodi Gamble, and India Summer each express their sexual desires in rather steamy fashion!
tagline: Ritual, Seduction, Initiation and Hot Sex!
title: Girls in White 2011 2
